headline.main: SWISS PRESS SEES GREATER U.S. HELP; Roosevelt Speech Said to Be Attempt to Prepare Nation for Any Eventuality ARMED AID HELD LOGICAL Hopeful Pronouncement for a 'Social Peace Under Social Democracy' Envisaged

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Dec. 31 -- "If really America's first lines of defense are in England, it would seem to be logical that the United States participate actively in the defense of the British Isles," says this morning's Tribune de Lausanne, commenting on President Roosevelt's speech.
abstract: by Swiss press; E Ferber in telegram to Amer First Com; Turkish press
